summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Working Sheet feature for Lead/Enquiry module. All 11 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with Working Sheet section properly implemented alongside Tender Document.
passed_tests: Backend: Upload working sheet PDF
Backend: Upload working sheet XLSX
Backend: Upload working sheet DOCX
Backend: Upload working sheet PNG
Backend: Reject invalid file types for working sheet
Backend: Delete working sheet
Backend: Upload working sheet to non-existent lead returns 404
Backend: Both tender document and working sheet can coexist on same lead
Backend: Deleting one document doesn't affect the other
Backend: Replace existing working sheet with new one
Backend: Lead model has working_sheet field
Frontend: Working Sheet section exists in Lead Form (new lead)
Frontend: Working Sheet section exists in Lead Form (edit lead)
Frontend: Working Sheet description shows 'Internal working document'
Frontend: Tender Document section exists with 'Customer-provided' description
Frontend: Both document upload areas present in Lead Form
Frontend: Working Sheet has cyan styling (distinct from amber Tender Document)
Frontend: Working Sheet upload area shows 'Click to upload working sheet'
Frontend: Tender Document displays in Lead Detail when uploaded
Frontend: Working Sheet conditionally displays in Lead Detail (only when uploaded)
seed_data_creation: Test leads and customers created during testing were cleaned up automatically via pytest fixtures
context_for_next_testing_agent: Working Sheet feature fully implemented and tested. Working Sheet is at lead level (one per lead), uses 'ws_' prefix in filename to differentiate from tender documents. Tender Document = customer-provided (amber styling), Working Sheet = internal reference (cyan styling). Both support PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PNG up to 25MB. Backend endpoints: POST /api/leads/{lead_id}/upload-working-sheet, DELETE /api/leads/{lead_id}/working-sheet. Document sections only display in Lead Detail when documents are uploaded.
